Title: Are We on the Same Team?
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Vladimir Cvetko, Jeff Dix (executive story editor), Monica Mitchell (story editor), Gabriela Uribe (staff writer), Andre J. Ferguson (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost and Tasha butt heads on how to grieve. Angela pursues the Jimenez Cartel while Kanan goes after Dre's organization. Tommy confides in LaKeisha about his relationship with Teresi, complicating everyone's lives.
